name: TentaKill
description:
Xbox Controller Required to play! For the best experience download and play on 'Fantastic' graphics setting.

Each player controls a tentacle and is tasked with destroying as much as possible within the time limit. The person who scores the most at the end of the time limit wins. You can focus on destroying the passing boats or wrapping yourself around your opponent, stopping them from doing the same.

The game can also be played single-player, but scoring will still be separated.

Each analogue stick controls a tentacle and the bumpers can be used to change the colour of their respective tentacle.

This game was made for the Global Game Jam 2017.
